# Resist Dweomer (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], Initiate of Mystra 2, [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action; see text

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC)Â­, pg. 113

The subject gains a +3 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities, but not against supernatural or extraordinary abilities.

At 11th level, you can cast this spell on yourself as a free action.

**GM Note**

*House Rules:* Name changed from *spell shield* to *resist dweomer* to avoid duplication.

Added Cleric 3, Sorcerer 3, Wizard 3 to Level.
